original_title: Don't Sweat the Dead/Hott Sushii Double Feature
overview: Don’t Sweat the Dead  Plunge into the exotic and erotic exercise world of sex super star, Xhyvette “ “Sushii” Holder. Put on your sweat bands and get ready to burn some excess calories in this horror themed workout video. Sushii is joined by her friends, Indica and Skylar to help you aerobicise! Don’t over exert yourself and remember to check your pulse before and after the workout!  Hott Sushii  Join Sushii as she prepares dinner for her very special guests Lunathyst and Indica. Things get hot and heavy at the dinner table and a playful cake fight ensues. A fun time for all, not to be taken too seriously.
title: Don't Sweat the Dead/Hott Sushii Double Feature
